NAME: ZZZ(notgame):[bios] Atari Lynx
NAME_ZH: ZZZ（非游戏）：[BIOS] 雅达利林克斯

NAME: A.P.B.
DESC:
You are police officer Bob, whose aim is to apprehend a certain quota of criminals (litterbugs, speeders and the like) each day. This is done by chasing them and sounding your siren at them - in some cases they will need ramming off the road.  There are also hardened criminals to catch - if you can get one of these to confess, your day's work is considered done.
The game's action is presented with an overhead view of your squad car. Car upgrades are available, to be brought from your reward money. You earn Demerits by crashing, wrongly arresting innocents, or failing to meet your quota. Too many demerits and it is game over.
DESC_ZH:
你是警官鲍勃，你的目标是每天逮捕一定数量的罪犯（乱扔垃圾者、超速驾驶者等等）。这需要通过追逐他们并向他们鸣响警笛来实现——在某些情况下，你需要将他们撞下路。此外，还有顽固的罪犯需要抓捕——如果你能让其中一个认罪，那么你当天的工作就完成了。
游戏以俯视视角展示你的警车行动。你可以用奖励金来升级车辆。如果你撞车、错误逮捕无辜者或未能完成任务指标，就会被记过。记过太多，游戏就结束了。

NAME: Alien vs Predator
DESC: Choose your weapon and brawl with the notorious warriors of the big screen! Commission the Colonial Marine and use your weapons and your wits to destroy the base--and survive. Be an Alien and use your voracious instincts to defend the hive and rescure your Queen. Or play a Predator and use your grisly arsenal to acquire the ultimate trophy...the skull of the Alien Queen.
DESC_ZH: 选择你的武器，与大银幕上臭名昭著的战士们展开激战！指挥殖民陆战队，运用你的武器和智慧摧毁基地——并存活下来。化身为异形，凭借你贪婪的本能守护巢穴并营救你的女王。或者扮演铁血战士，使用你可怕的武器库来获取终极战利品……异形女王的头骨。

NAME: Awesome Golf
DESC: Awesome Golf is as the name suggests, a golf simulator. There are 3 courses to play one in the U.K one in the U.S and the third one in Japan. The gameplay involves you lining up your shot via an overhead view which when set up switches to a third person view. Whilst in this view you need to swing the club and stop it at the desired power and then stop it on the correct symbol to get the perfect hit. If you don't get it right you will either miss the ball or hit the earth. There are 14 clubs at your disposal, 8 irons, 3 woods 2 wedges and a putter which are selected by moving the hand cursor over you Golf bag and selecting the desired club.
DESC_ZH: 正如其名，《精彩高尔夫》是一款高尔夫模拟游戏。游戏中有三个球场可供游玩，分别位于英国、美国和日本。游戏玩法是，你先通过俯瞰视角来调整击球角度，设置好后视角会切换为第三人称视角。在这个视角下，你需要挥动球杆，并在达到理想的击球力度时停下，然后在正确的符号处停止，以实现完美击球。如果操作不当，你要么打空球，要么就会打到地面。你可以使用14种球杆，包括8支铁杆、3支木杆、2支挖起杆和1支推杆，通过将手形光标移到高尔夫球袋上并选择所需的球杆即可进行切换。

NAME: Baseball Heroes
DESC: Hit, run, dive, jump, catch and throw. Pitch for the strikeout record and swing for the fences! Play baseball against the Lynx or take on a friend. Four different games with super graphics!
DESC_ZH: 击球、奔跑、俯冲、跳跃、接球和投球。争取创造三振出局纪录，全力挥棒击球！与山猫队对战，或者和朋友来一场棒球对决。四款不同的游戏，拥有超棒的画面！

NAME: Basketbrawl
DESC:
In a desperate attempt to stop inner-city gang wars, the city leaders organized a basketball league.  The league is scheduled to play on three courts: a street, a junkyard, and a rooftop.  The mayor figured that a friendly game of hoops would be a much more peaceful way to settle disputes. He was wrong.
You can choose 1-on-1 or 2-on-2 game modes. There are six characters to choose from (ten in Atari Lynx version); each with their own health, speed, and power attributes. Each player without the ball can jump to block a shot or punch there opponent to get the ball. There's also an option to perform a power throw on an opposing player. Players with the ball can shoot or pass. Power ups appear on the court at random instances. These power up one attribute for the player. For example, the lightning power up increases the player's speed. 
The referee does not call fouls, but does hurl knives at the players.
DESC_ZH:
为了竭力阻止市中心的帮派战争，城市领导人组织了一场篮球联赛。联赛安排在三个场地进行：街道、垃圾场和屋顶。市长认为，一场友好的篮球比赛会是解决争端的更和平方式。但他错了。
你可以选择 1 对 1 或 2 对 2 的游戏模式。有六个角色可供选择（雅达利林克斯版有十个）；每个角色都有自己的生命值、速度和力量属性。每个没有球的玩家可以跳跃阻挡投篮，或者击打对手来抢球。还有一个选项可以对对手进行强力投掷。持球的玩家可以投篮或传球。道具会随机出现在球场上。这些道具会提升玩家的一项属性。例如，闪电道具会增加玩家的速度。
裁判不会判罚犯规，但会向玩家投掷飞刀。

NAME: Batman Returns
DESC:
Atari themselves adapted the 1992 superhero sequel Batman Returns for their Lynx handheld as a side-scrolling beat'em'up.
Batman must move through four levels on his quest to stop the Penguin and Catwoman. Enemies trying to stop him include circus clowns on the streets, policemen (whom Catwoman put on his trail) on the roofs of Gotham City, and penguin commandos in the sewers and the Penguin's lair.
Batman can beat them up with his fists or destroy them using Batarangs and acid vials (which must be collected first). Several of the levels end in boss encounters with the two main villains, while in the last level, Batman must also save industrialist Max Shreck from the Penguin's wrath before finishing him off.
DESC_ZH:
雅达利公司将1992年的超级英雄续集电影《蝙蝠侠归来》改编成了适用于其Lynx掌机的横版清版动作游戏。
蝙蝠侠必须闯过四个关卡，以阻止企鹅人和猫女的阴谋。试图阻止他的敌人包括街上的马戏团小丑、哥谭市屋顶上的警察（是猫女引他们来追踪蝙蝠侠的），以及下水道和企鹅人老巢里的企鹅突击队。
蝙蝠侠可以用拳头揍扁敌人，也可以用蝙蝠飞镖和酸液瓶（必须先收集到）消灭他们。有几个关卡的结尾是与两大反派首领的对决，而在最后一关，蝙蝠侠还必须在彻底击败企鹅人之前，将实业家马克斯·施雷克从企鹅人的怒火中解救出来。

NAME: BattleWheels
DESC:
In the year 2019, Humankind turned to more and more dangerous games for its entertainment. Fight in high-tech cars armed with missiles, machine guns, flame-throwers, and more through dead cities and desert wastelands; a sixteen arena battle royal! Fight as a team or go solo! Custom build your car from the ground up or buy one from the Bodyshop. You can even go in on foot! Fast paced 3-D six player action like you've never seen before! 
 
Welcome to the World of BattleWheels.
DESC_ZH:
在2019年，人类为了娱乐而转向越来越危险的游戏。驾驶装备着导弹、机枪、火焰喷射器等武器的高科技汽车，在死寂的城市和沙漠荒原中战斗；这是一场十六人竞技场大逃杀！可以团队作战，也能独自出击！你可以从头开始自定义打造你的汽车，也能从汽车改装店购买一辆。你甚至可以徒步参战！前所未有的快节奏3D六人对战！

欢迎来到战斗轮的世界。

NAME: Battlezone 2000
DESC: In this game you play the role of a tank commander who is fighting in a future war in the 21st century. The game is an update on the classic arcade game Battlezone and stays true to the original in terms of gameplay. The gameplay involves you driving round a landscape destroying enemy tanks and U.F.O.s  whilst trying not to run out of fuel and also not getting destroyed yourself though luckily there are fuel pick-ups and power-ups to collect. You can also use the credits earned for completing missions to upgrade your tank. There are also a few different tanks to choose from including the Rhino which is heavily armoured but runs out of fuel faster than the other tanks.
DESC_ZH: 在这款游戏中，你将扮演一名坦克指挥官，参与21世纪的未来战争。该游戏是经典街机游戏《战区》的升级版，在玩法上忠实于原作。游戏玩法包括驾驶坦克在地图上行驶，摧毁敌方坦克和不明飞行物，同时要尽量避免燃料耗尽，也要防止自己被摧毁。幸运的是，游戏中有燃料补给点和道具可以收集。你还可以用完成任务获得的积分来升级你的坦克。此外，还有几种不同的坦克可供选择，其中包括“犀牛”坦克，它装甲厚重，但比其他坦克消耗燃料的速度更快。

NAME: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
NAME_ZH: 比尔和泰德的奇妙冒险
DESC:
The Lynx title based on the Keanu Reeves/Alex Winter film franchise actually takes place after the second film, Bill and Ted's Bogus Journey. Out for revenge after being humiliated by the high-school duo, Death kidnaps their "medieval babe" girlfriends from the first film, and drags them throughout history.  Luckily, the girls are able to leave behind pages of the band's latest song as a trail for Bill and Ted to follow.
Playing as either Bill or Ted (with a friend able to take control of the other character over ComLynx), the player must search historical periods in an overhead perspective and collect enough musical notes to open travel to a new area. Along the way, they can encounter historical figures who will offer assistance in return for a favor.  Bad guys do populate the levels, but can be pacified with a rippin' guitar solo.  If Bill or Ted are defeated, they simply reappear back at the last checkpoint.
Other items can be found and collected in an inventory. The Lynx title makes use of the series' interesting take on the time continuum, allowing the player to leave items for themselves in the past to collect and use in the future.  Likewise, if the player happens upon a sudden fortuitous item that "they" left, they must remember to go and leave the item in the past themselves to avoid creating a time paradox. This quirky view of time forms the basis of many of the game's puzzles.
A password system is constantly updated (viewable at the pause screen) to save the player's progress.
DESC_ZH:
这款基于基努·里维斯和亚历克斯·温特主演电影系列改编的Lynx游戏，实际上发生在第二部电影《比尔和泰德畅游鬼门关》之后。死神因被这对高中好友羞辱而展开复仇，绑架了他们在第一部电影中结识的“中世纪美女”女友们，并将她们拖到了历史长河中。幸运的是，女孩们能够留下乐队最新歌曲的乐谱残页，为比尔和泰德指引追踪的线索。

玩家可以选择扮演比尔或泰德（还能通过ComLynx让朋友操控另一个角色），以俯瞰视角在各个历史时期中探索，收集足够的音符，从而开启前往新区域的通道。一路上，他们会遇到一些历史人物，这些人物会要求玩家帮个忙，作为回报，他们会提供相应的帮助。关卡中也有坏人，但可以用一段精彩的吉他独奏将他们安抚。如果比尔或泰德被击败，他们会在最后一个检查点重新出现。

玩家还可以找到其他物品并将其收入物品栏。这款Lynx游戏巧妙运用了该系列对时间连续性的独特设定，玩家可以将物品留在过去，以便在未来取用。同样，如果玩家偶然发现了“自己”留在过去的幸运物品，就必须记得回到过去把物品留下，以免造成时间悖论。这种对时间的奇特设定构成了游戏中许多谜题的基础。

游戏设有密码系统，会不断更新（在暂停界面可见），用于保存玩家的游戏进度。

NAME: Block Out
DESC: Block Out is a Tetris variant with an added twist: it's in 3D. The player can rotate the blocks in 3D in order to fit them into the pit they are being guided into. Advanced users can play this game with odd three-dimensional pieces, or change the size of the pit, for depth of between 6 and 18 piles, and width and length of between 3 and 7.
DESC_ZH: 《方块消除》是一款有新玩法的俄罗斯方块变体游戏：它是3D的。玩家可以在三维空间中旋转方块，以便将它们放入引导的坑中。高级玩家可以使用奇特的三维方块来玩这个游戏，或者改变坑的大小，坑的深度可以在6到18层之间调整，宽度和长度可以在3到7之间调整。

NAME: Blue Lightning
DESC:
The insanely evil General Drako is spreading his own special blend of spite and chaos around the globe.  You are a top fighter pilot for the UN's Blue Lightning squad.  You have to travel from continent to continent, and end Drako's plans at each stop using your awesome flight skills.
Blue Lightning is a 3D flight game featuring 7 real-life fighter jets.  There are several types of missions, including dogfights, ground targets, and escorts. Your arsenal consists of various cannons, missiles, and special bombs.  The game can be played either from a behind-the-plane perspective, or an in-cockpit perspective.
DESC_ZH:
极其邪恶的德拉科将军正在全球范围内散播他那独特的怨恨与混乱。你是联合国“蓝色闪电”小队的顶级战斗机飞行员。你必须辗转各大洲，凭借出色的飞行技能，在每一站挫败德拉科的阴谋。
“蓝色闪电”是一款3D飞行游戏，游戏中有7款现实中的战斗机。游戏包含多种类型的任务，包括空战、地面目标打击和护航任务。你的武器库中有各种机炮、导弹和特殊炸弹。游戏可以从飞机后方视角或驾驶舱内视角进行游玩。

NAME: Bubble Trouble
DESC: You are Travis, a scientist doing experiments with dense matter for the creation of artificial black holes for interstellar travel. While testing a piece of equipment, you are transported into a bubble world. Fortunately, a friendly denizen decides to help you. You must locate the correct type of radioactive particles to move from world to world and finally home, before the hostile denizens of these worlds burst your bubble.
DESC_ZH: 你是特拉维斯，一名科学家，正在进行关于致密物质的实验，旨在为星际旅行创造人造黑洞。在测试一件设备时，你被传送到了一个泡泡世界。幸运的是，一位友善的居民决定帮助你。你必须找到正确类型的放射性粒子，才能在这些世界的敌对居民戳破你的泡泡之前，从一个世界转移到另一个世界，最终回到家中。

NAME: Cabal
DESC:
This coin-on game pits you and your partner against hordes of enemy soldiers. Fight waves of ground troops, tanks and planes. Will you survive long enough to face the final Boss - a mad man bent on conquering the world? 
 
Note: This game was never released.
DESC_ZH:
这款投币式游戏让你和你的搭档与成群的敌军士兵对战。对抗一波又一波的地面部队、坦克和飞机。你能坚持到面对最终 boss 吗——一个一心想要征服世界的疯子？ 

注意：这款游戏从未发布过。

NAME: California Games
DESC:
California Games was the original "Extreme Games" – what today's generation might call "X-Games in the sun".  Players can select sponsors (absent in some versions) and compete in events such as skateboarding, footbag, surfing, roller skating, flying disc (frisbee) and BMX.  The surfing event is ranked by judges, which give a score to help the players improve their routine.
The Atari versions (2600 and Lynx) of the game omit the flying disc and roller skating events, while the Genesis version omits only the flying disc event.
DESC_ZH:
《加州运动会》是最早的“极限运动会”——如今这一代人可能会称之为“阳光下的极限运动大赛”。玩家可以选择赞助商（某些版本中没有此功能），并参加滑板、踢毽子、冲浪、轮滑、飞盘（飞碟）和小轮车等项目的比赛。冲浪项目由裁判打分，分数可以帮助玩家改进自己的动作套路。
该游戏的雅达利版本（2600和Lynx）取消了飞盘和轮滑项目，而世嘉Genesis版本仅取消了飞盘项目。

NAME: Centipede
DESC: Hundreds and thousands of them. Creepy ones. Crawly ones. Buzzing ones. Swarming ones. And they're all trying to get you. Before you get them.
DESC_ZH: 成百上千的它们。令人毛骨悚然的家伙。蠕动爬行的家伙。嗡嗡作响的家伙。蜂拥而至的家伙。它们都想在你消灭它们之前先抓住你。

NAME: Checkered Flag
DESC: Checkered Flag brought the excitement of formula-style open-wheel racing to the Atari Lynx handheld console. Race on 18 unique tracks, in practice, single heat, or tournament modes. Options include customizing the length of the race, number of opponents, colour of the car, and sex of the driver.
DESC_ZH: 《方格旗赛车》将方程式风格的开放式轮赛车的刺激感带到了雅达利Lynx掌上游戏机上。你可以在18条独特的赛道上进行练习赛、单轮赛或锦标赛模式的比赛。游戏选项包括自定义比赛长度、对手数量、赛车颜色和车手性别。

NAME: Chip's Challenge
DESC: Nerdy Chip desperately wants to join the "Bit Busters" computer club, led by Melinda the Mental Marvel.  However, before she'll let him in, he must prove his intelligence by passing the initiation test.  149 increasingly difficult levels, including a few hidden ones, await Chip in this tile-based puzzle game.  Use tools such as keys, and special shoes to bypass obstacles.  Manipulate switches to and use dirt blocks to build bridges across waterways.  Avoid enemy creatures, grab all the computer chips in the level, and hurry to the exit: On top of everything else, there's a time limit!
DESC_ZH: 书呆子奇普非常想加入由“智力奇迹”梅林达领导的“比特破坏者”计算机俱乐部。然而，在她允许他加入之前，他必须通过入门测试来证明自己的智力。在这款基于图块的益智游戏中，奇普将面对149个难度逐渐增加的关卡，其中还包括一些隐藏关卡。使用钥匙等工具和特殊鞋子来绕过障碍物。操纵开关，并利用土块在水道上搭建桥梁。避开敌人生物，收集关卡中的所有计算机芯片，然后赶紧冲向出口：除此之外，还有时间限制！

NAME: ZZZ(notgame):Conquest Of Zow
DESC:
Conquest of Zow started as a collection of sound and graphics demos. This project was cancelled when the ROM for the game was leaked online and Harry stopped all Lynx development. 
 
There has been a Blue PCB cart version with the ROM created, this was made without permission or knowledge of from the developer.
DESC_ZH:
《佐夫征服战》最初是一系列声音和图形演示的集合。当该游戏的ROM在网上泄露，哈里停止了所有山猫主机游戏的开发工作后，这个项目就被取消了。

曾有人未经开发者许可或知情，用该ROM制作出了蓝色印刷电路板卡带版本。

NAME: Crystal Mines II - Buried Treasure (World) (Unl)
NAME_ZH: 水晶矿场2 - 埋藏的宝藏（全球版）（未授权）

NAME: Crystal Mines II
DESC: Great treasure still lies deep in the abandoned Crystal Mines. But over the years, underground demons have made them deadly. Guide your robot through the mines, destroying demons and gathering great wealth. Or fail, and become history.
DESC_ZH: 巨大的宝藏仍深埋在废弃的水晶矿场中。但多年来，地下恶魔让这里变得危机四伏。引导你的机器人穿越矿场，消灭恶魔，收集巨额财富。否则，你将功亏一篑，成为历史。

NAME: Daemonsgate
DESC: Daemonsgate is a Role-Playing game, published by Electronic Innovative Design, which was cancelled before it was released.
DESC_ZH: 《恶魔之门》是一款由电子创新设计公司（Electronic Innovative Design）发行的角色扮演游戏，该游戏在发布前就已取消开发。

FILE: Desert Strike - Return to the Gulf (USA, Europe).zip
NAME: Desert Strike
DESC:
The first game in the Strike series. A year after the Gulf War, a self-styled general named Kilbaba (Muababa in the GBA version) takes over an Arab Emirate and threatens to start World War III against his western enemy, the United States. The whole world holds its breath as the President has chosen you to destroy Kilbaba and his terrorist army before he launches a nuclear attack on the world! 
 
You must fly a specially designed AH-64A Apache on a series of missions to rescue missing-in-action characters, destroy power plants, blow apart SCUD missiles, etc. to take out the enemy defense while trying to find out Kilbaba's plans.
DESC_ZH:
《风暴》系列的首款游戏。海湾战争结束一年后，一位自封将军的基尔巴巴（GBA 版本中为穆阿巴巴）占领了一个阿拉伯酋长国，并威胁要对其西方敌人——美国发动第三次世界大战。全世界都屏住了呼吸，因为总统已选定你在基尔巴巴向世界发动核攻击之前，摧毁他及其恐怖军队！

你必须驾驶一架经过特殊设计的 AH - 64A 阿帕奇直升机执行一系列任务，营救失踪人员、摧毁发电厂、炸毁飞毛腿导弹等，在设法查明基尔巴巴计划的同时，突破敌人的防线。

NAME: Dinolympics
DESC: Come back to the dawn of history in this combination of puzzling problems, awesome adventures, and mind-bending mazes. The survival of your race is at stake!
DESC_ZH: 在这款融合了谜题挑战、精彩冒险和烧脑迷宫的游戏中，回到历史的开端。你所在种族的生存正面临威胁！

NAME: Dirty Larry : Renegade Cop
DESC: He's the baddest of the good guys. He's Dirty Larry - Renegade Cop. Mr. Big's Gang is determined to end his career for good--if his own Captain doesn't do it first! So take to the streets in a hurry. It's time for a little house cleaning!
DESC_ZH: 他是好人中的狠角色。他就是邋遢拉里——叛逆警察。黑帮老大的团伙一心要彻底终结他的职业生涯——前提是他的队长不会先这么做！所以赶紧走上街头吧。是时候来一场大扫除啦！

NAME: Double Dragon
DESC:
Set in a post-apocalyptic New York, Double Dragon is the story of Billy and Jimmy Lee, twin brothers trained in the fighting style of Sou-Setsu-Ken. Together, they manage a small martial arts training school, teaching their students in self-defense. One day, Billy's girlfriend, Marian, is kidnapped off the street by the "Black Warriors", a savage street gang led by a man named Willy. The Black Warriors demand the Lee brothers disclose their martial arts secrets in exchange for Marian's freedom. The Lee brothers set out on a rescue mission to crush the Black Warriors and save Marian.
Using whatever techniques they have at their disposal, from the basic punches and kicks to the invulnerable elbow strike, as well any weapon that comes into their hands, the Lee brothers must pursue the gang through the city slum, industrial area and the forest before reaching their hideout to confront the big boss, Willy.
DESC_ZH:
故事设定在末日之后的纽约，《双截龙》讲述了比利和吉米·李这对孪生兄弟的故事，他们修习了双截拳格斗术。兄弟俩共同经营着一所小型武术培训学校，教授学生自卫技巧。一天，比利的女友玛丽安在街上被“黑武士”——一个由威利为首的残暴街头帮派绑架。黑武士们要求李氏兄弟透露他们的武术秘诀，以换取玛丽安的自由。李氏兄弟踏上了营救之旅，决心粉碎黑武士帮派，拯救玛丽安。
李氏兄弟要运用他们所掌握的各种技巧，从基本的拳打脚到无敌的肘击，以及任何到手的武器。他们必须在城市贫民窟、工业区和森林中追踪这个帮派，然后抵达他们的藏身之处，与大首领威利对决。

NAME: Dracula The Undead
DESC: In this game you play the role of Jonathan Harker, an Estate Agent who has visited Dracula's castle to conduct some business. The gameplay is a point and click style adventure except it has been tweaked to accommodate the Lynx controls. To interact with an object you move Jonathan next to the object with the D-Pad and then its name will pop up in the interaction bar. You then need to select an action such as Open, Close examine e.t.c.. The main idea of the game is to explore Dracula's castle while he is away and try to gather information that will prove he is a very serious threat to the mortal world. there are also other character in the game to interact with and Bram Stoker (the writer of Dracula which this game is based on) is in the game in digital form to narrate the story.
DESC_ZH: 在这款游戏中，你将扮演房产经纪人乔纳森·哈克，他前往德古拉的城堡洽谈生意。游戏玩法是点触式冒险风格，不过为适配山猫游戏机的操作进行了调整。要与物品互动，你需用方向键将乔纳森移动到物品旁边，随后物品名称会在互动栏中弹出。接着，你需要选择一个动作，如打开、关闭、检查等。游戏的主要目标是在德古拉外出时探索他的城堡，并设法收集能证明他对凡人世界构成严重威胁的信息。游戏中还有其他角色可供互动，而布拉姆·斯托克（《德古拉》的作者，本游戏正是基于这部作品）会以数字化形象在游戏中讲述故事。

NAME: Electrocop
DESC:
Today, if a daughter of the President goes missing, I would look in the nearest bar. However, in the near future, the explanation is that she's been kidnapped by a Criminal Brain robot, and held in a booby-trapped lair. As the advanced hybrid Electrocop, your task is to rescue her within an hour.
Gameplay involves working your way through the complex warehouse maze, unlocking coded door along the way. Extra weapons can be collected to help dealing with the drones. There are also computer terminals to buy new weapons - these also have simple subgames built in. What makes the game unique, and intended as a showpiece for the Lynx hardware, is that full 3D is used, so that the character walks in and out of the screen as well as across it.
DESC_ZH:
如今，如果总统的女儿失踪了，我会去最近的酒吧找找。然而，在不久的将来，情况却是她被一台犯罪大脑机器人绑架，并被关押在一个布满陷阱的巢穴里。作为先进的混合体电子警察，你的任务是在一小时内救出她。
游戏玩法包括在复杂的仓库迷宫中摸索前行，沿途解锁带密码的门。你可以收集额外的武器来对付无人机。还有电脑终端可以用来购买新武器——这些终端里还内置了简单的小游戏。这款游戏的独特之处，也是它作为Lynx硬件展示之作的原因，在于它采用了完整的3D效果，这样角色不仅可以在屏幕上左右移动，还能进出屏幕。

NAME: European Soccer Challenge
DESC: European Soccer Challenge gives you all the excitement and tension of the European Challenge Cup in this action packed version of the world's most popular game featuring over 170 teams from 32 countries. Has your team got what it takes?
DESC_ZH: 《欧洲足球挑战赛》为你带来欧洲挑战杯的所有刺激与紧张感。在这个节奏紧凑的版本中，你将体验到世界最受欢迎的运动，游戏中有来自32个国家的超过170支球队。你的球队有实力夺冠吗？

NAME: Eye Of The Beholder
DESC: Put your best fighters up front. Battle Axe wielding Skeletons are among the first horrors you'll encounter in 13 levels of mayhem. Will they be the last? These flinds aren't your friends. And they like to hunt in packs! Ever met a Kuo-Toa? It's an electrifying experience. Even more shocking is The Beholder himself, if you survive long enough to meet him. Don't forget to look behind you! Giant spiders like to watch you pass, then strike.
DESC_ZH: 让你最厉害的战士站在前面。挥舞战斧的骷髅是你在13层混乱关卡中最先遇到的恐怖怪物之一。它们会是最后一批吗？这些怪物可不是你的朋友。而且它们喜欢成群结队地狩猎！你见过库托阿人吗？那会是一次令人激动不已的经历。更令人震惊的是魔眼本身，如果你能撑到见到它的话。别忘了回头看看！巨型蜘蛛喜欢看着你走过，然后发动攻击。

NAME: Fat Bobby
DESC:
Fat Bobby, the lead guitar player, has had his musical group kidnapped by the evil Dr. Mephisto. 
 
You guide Bobby thru a multitude of levels in this classic platform hopper. 
 
Collect notes and hints, as you encounter the henchmen of Dr. Mephisto. 
 
That guitar can "strum" more than just notes!
DESC_ZH:
主吉他手胖鲍比的音乐团队被邪恶的墨菲斯托博士绑架了。

在这款经典的平台跳跃游戏中，你要引导鲍比闯过众多关卡。

当你遇到墨菲斯托博士的手下时，收集音符和提示。

那把吉他可不止能“弹奏”音符！

FILE: Fidelity Ultimate Chess Challenge, The (USA, Europe).zip
NAME: The Fidelity Ultimate Chess Challenge
NAME_ZH: 富达终极国际象棋挑战
DESC:
On your own against the Fidelity Ultimate Chess Challenge - the world's most powerful hand-held chess game - or against a friend, the stunning 3D graphics and advanced technology of this latest game from Telegames has to be played to be believed.
The Fidelity Ultimate Chess Challenge uses the most powerful chess playing technology from the laboratories of Fidelity - the premier manufacturers of dedicated chess computers are developers of the world's only USCF certified Master rated (2325) chess program.
Switch from 3D to overhead view for the final attack - or use one of the many options available to review the game to date.
Full on-screen statistics giving score, times, moves etc. and many other features on this the world's fastest color hand-held chess game.
DESC_ZH:
你可以独自挑战富达终极国际象棋挑战——全球最强大的手持国际象棋游戏，也可以与朋友对战。这款由Telegames推出的最新游戏，其惊人的3D画面和先进技术，只有亲自体验才能相信。
富达终极国际象棋挑战采用了富达实验室最强大的国际象棋对战技术。富达是专业国际象棋电脑的顶级制造商，也是全球唯一获得美国国际象棋联合会（USCF）认证、达到大师等级（2325分）的国际象棋程序的开发者。
在进行最后攻击时，你可以从3D视角切换到俯瞰视角，或者使用众多选项中的一个来回顾到目前为止的棋局。
这款全球最快的彩色手持国际象棋游戏具备完整的屏幕统计信息，显示得分、用时、步数等，还有许多其他功能。

NAME: Full Court Press
DESC:
Multi-featured basketball action, including high school, college and pro league teams. A must for all sport brains! 
 
This game was never completed and was not released.
DESC_ZH:
多功能篮球游戏，包含高中、大学和职业联赛球队。所有体育迷的必备之选！

这款游戏从未完成，也未发布。

NAME: Gates Of Zendocon
DESC:
The evil spider Zendocon has trapped you in its web of universes.  Your mission is to defeat Zendocon's droids and brave the 51 universes to fight Zendocon itself to the death!
Gates of Zendocon is a side-scrolling shooter very similar to the original arcade shooter of this type, Scramble.  Unlike Scramble, there are 51 game areas in total, but the player fights through a subset of them through branches, choosing the next area to visit.  
Some aliens will join you when shot (power-ups).  Alien bases in each area allow you to repair your weapons and shield, but landing at the wrong time will cause your ship to explode and lose all power-ups.
DESC_ZH:
邪恶蜘蛛赞多肯将你困在了它的多元宇宙之网中。你的任务是击败赞多肯的机器人，勇敢地穿越51个宇宙，与赞多肯进行一场生死决斗！
《赞多肯之门》是一款横向卷轴射击游戏，与该类型的经典街机射击游戏《太空侵略者》非常相似。与《太空侵略者》不同的是，游戏总共有51个游戏区域，但玩家可以通过分支路线穿越其中一部分区域，并选择下一个要前往的区域。
一些外星人在被击中后会加入你（获得道具加成）。每个区域的外星人基地可以让你修复武器和护盾，但如果在错误的时间降落，你的飞船将会爆炸并失去所有道具加成。

NAME: Gauntlet : The Third Encounter
DESC: Gauntlet: The Third Encounter is an arcade-style action game by Atari, that was released on the Atari Lynx handheld in 1990. The game can be played by one to four players simultaneously. It introduced new character classes like ?Nerd? or ?Punkrocker? and was one of a few games that used the ?vertical mode? of the Atari Lynx, another being the port of Klax. The story: a crystal falls from the sky and lands in a castle, and it must be retrieved from within its 40 mazes type area. A year later U.S. Gold and Tengen would release another completely different game called Gauntlet III: The Final Quest.
DESC_ZH: 《魔剑侠情：第三次遭遇》是雅达利出品的一款街机风格动作游戏，于1990年在雅达利Lynx掌机上发行。该游戏支持1 - 4名玩家同时游玩。它引入了新的角色职业，如“书呆子”或“朋克摇滚歌手”，并且是少数使用雅达利Lynx“垂直模式”的游戏之一，另一款使用该模式的游戏是《方块接龙》的移植版。游戏剧情：一颗水晶从天而降，落在一座城堡中，玩家必须从城堡内40个迷宫区域里将其找回。一年后，美国金公司和天仁公司发布了另一款完全不同的游戏，名为《魔剑侠情III：最终任务》。

NAME: Geoduel
DESC: Manoeuvre your ship in a grid-like world of speed and danger. Dodge the many obstacles on the grid surface while leaving a wall of light behind you. Try to trip your enemies and make them crash to their doom.
DESC_ZH: 在这个充满速度与危险的网格世界中操控你的飞船。在网格表面躲避众多障碍物，同时在身后留下一道光墙。设法绊倒你的敌人，让他们撞毁灭亡。

NAME: Gordo 106
DESC:
You are a monkey named Gordo, resident of N. Human Labs cage 106, a laboratory experimenting with animals.  One day Gordo accidentally ingests a nuclear spiked banana, causing his brain to become larger and become more human and thought and figures out what is going on.  He gets loose and is now on a mission to free his animal friends and escape the evil clutches of the N. Human Laboratory.
Banana's are your only health pick up and you use apples to fight off enemies.  Gordo is very agile and can swing from chains that hang from the ceiling to avoid the many pits that litter the floor.
DESC_ZH:
你是一只名叫戈尔多的猴子，居住在N人类实验室的106号笼子里，这是一个进行动物实验的实验室。有一天，戈尔多不小心吃下了一根被注入核能的香蕉，这使得它的大脑变大，思维变得更像人类，也明白了周围正在发生的事情。它成功逃脱，现在肩负着拯救动物朋友们并逃离N人类实验室邪恶掌控的使命。
香蕉是你唯一的回血道具，你可以用苹果来击退敌人。戈尔多非常敏捷，它可以抓住从天花板垂下的铁链荡来荡去，以此避开散落在地面上的众多陷阱。

NAME: Guardians, The - Storm Over Doria
DESC: Guardians: Storm Over Doria was going to be a RPG game for the Lynx, probably the first and only during Atari's era. There are a number of different prototypes that show off character selection, world map navigation, and dungeon navigation. There is a typical RPG style actions menu which lets you examine items, prepare spells, etc, not many of these actions are implemented but it is possible to launch fireballs! Walking around town seems to be very glitchy and all buildings you can enter seem to be the same shop. There are sound effects.
DESC_ZH: 《守护者：多利亚的风暴》原本是一款为Lynx掌机开发的角色扮演游戏，可能是雅达利时代的首款也是唯一一款此类游戏。有多个不同的原型展示了角色选择、世界地图导航和地下城探索。游戏中有一个典型的角色扮演风格的动作菜单，你可以查看物品、准备法术等，虽然这些动作大多未完全实现，但你可以发射火球！在城镇中行走似乎有很多漏洞，而且所有你能进入的建筑看起来都是同一家商店。游戏中有音效。

NAME: Hard Drivin'
DESC:
Hard Drivin' is a 3D arcade hit from Atari Games. You are in control of a high-performance sports car. Your objective is to race around the course as fast as possible and hit as many checkpoints as possible. If you hit a checkpoint you gain extra time to go farther. You will see traffic on the road both in your direction and coming down the opposite direction, so be careful when you pass... 
The course has two sections: speed track, and stunt track. Speed track is longer, but you can usually achieve higher speeds. Stunt track requires you to perform several stunts such as jumping bridges, driving through a loop, and so on. 
Crashing the car has no serious consequences and indeed shows a replay of your crash from a cinematic angle. Admire your crash head-on into the cement truck, or clipping the minivan, or flying off the bridge in the wrong angle... You lose several seconds as your car is "reset" and you get up to speed again. 
The home conversions retain most of the then-advanced 3D graphics but lack the force-feedback that was in the arcade version.
DESC_ZH:
《疯狂赛车》是雅达利游戏公司推出的一款热门3D街机游戏。你将操控一辆高性能跑车。你的目标是尽可能快地在赛道上飞驰，并尽可能多地通过检查点。如果你通过了一个检查点，就会获得额外的时间，让你跑得更远。你会看到道路上有同向和对向的车辆，所以超车时要小心……
赛道分为两个部分：高速赛道和特技赛道。高速赛道更长，但你通常可以达到更高的速度。特技赛道要求你完成一些特技动作，比如飞跃桥梁、穿过环形赛道等等。
撞车不会有严重后果，实际上还会从电影视角回放你的撞车画面。欣赏一下你正面撞上水泥卡车、擦到小货车，或者以错误角度飞出桥梁的场景……当你的车“重置”并再次加速时，你会损失几秒时间。
家用版保留了当时大部分先进的3D图形效果，但缺少街机版的力反馈功能。

NAME: Hockey
DESC: This game, as the name suggests, is a hockey simulation which is very similar to Mario Lemieux Hockey. There are 22 teams to choose from which are based on the NHL 91 line up though they can be changed if the player wishes. You control 1 player at a time and the CPU controls the rest of your team though you can switch to a different player at any time if the need arises. There is also a fight penalty system where you have to continually punch the an opponent in order to proceed. The game is viewed from an isometric perspective as if you were sat in one of the crowd seats.
DESC_ZH: 这款游戏，顾名思义，是一款曲棍球模拟游戏，与《马里奥·勒米厄曲棍球》非常相似。游戏中有22支球队可供选择，这些球队基于1991年美国国家冰球联盟（NHL）的阵容，不过玩家若有需要也可以更改。你每次控制一名球员，其余队员由电脑控制，但如有需要，你可以随时切换到其他球员。游戏还有打架惩罚系统，你必须持续击打对手才能继续。游戏采用等轴测视角，就好像你坐在观众席上一样。

NAME: Hydra
DESC:
If being the best speedboat racer in the world were all there was to life, you'd live on easy street.  But when the government of Hydra has asked for your help in defeating Hydra's enemies by couriering parts to a secret weapon, and those enemies know you're coming... well then, life gets interesting.
Race down narrow swamp lanes to deliver parts of a secret weapon to bases at the finish of each section.  Enemies will be shooting at you, but you can shoot back with Uzi Cannons and Nukes.  Collect crystals along the way to boost your speed or shields.
DESC_ZH:
如果人生的全部意义仅在于成为世界上最优秀的快艇赛车手，那你的生活将会一帆风顺。但当“九头蛇”政府请求你帮忙，通过运送零件来制造一件秘密武器以击败敌人，而那些敌人又知晓你的行动时……那么，生活就变得有趣起来了。

沿着狭窄的沼泽水道飞驰，将秘密武器的零件送到每个赛段终点的基地。敌人会向你开枪，但你可以用乌兹冲锋枪炮和核弹进行反击。沿途收集水晶，以提升你的速度或护盾。

FILE: Ishido - The Way of Stones (USA, Europe).zip
NAME: Ishido : The Way of Stones
DESC: Introducing Ishido, the ancient and intricate Game of the Stones. You must place stones on the game board, matching colors and patterns according to centuries-old rules. It requires great skill and concentration--but if you can unlock the secret of the Oracle, its wisdom will help you!
DESC_ZH: 为您介绍石道，一款古老而复杂的石头游戏。您必须在游戏棋盘上放置石头，按照流传了几个世纪的规则匹配颜色和图案。这需要高超的技巧和高度的专注——但如果您能解开神谕的秘密，它的智慧将助您一臂之力！

NAME: Jimmy Connors' Tennis
DESC: Jimmy Connors' Tennis is a Sports game, published by Atari, which was released in 1993.
DESC_ZH: 《吉米·康纳斯网球》是一款由雅达利公司发行的体育游戏，于1993年发布。

NAME: Joust
DESC:
In Joust, players take control of a knight with a lance who rides their flying ostrich (or stork, for Player 2) to do battle against computer-controlled evil knights who ride atop vultures.
Players must flap their steed's wings to hit the enemy from a higher jousting point to destroy the vulture and its rider. Once the enemy has been hit, an egg falls to one of the platforms below. The heroic knights must destroy the eggs before they hatch and release new and increasingly more difficult knights. The three strengths of enemy knights are Bounder (red knight), Hunter (white knight), and Shadow Lord (blue knight). These enemy knights are not the only challenge to be found in the game. Players must also contend with crumbling platforms, lava trolls who attempt to pull knights into the fire, and the dreaded "unbeatable"(?) pterodactyl.
The game was novel for its time for being one of the few two-player simultaneous games in the arcade.
DESC_ZH:
在《骑士飞行大战》中，玩家操控一名手持长矛的骑士，骑着会飞的鸵鸟（玩家 2 骑的是鹳），与电脑控制的邪恶骑士作战，这些邪恶骑士骑在秃鹫背上。
玩家必须扇动坐骑的翅膀，从更高的位置冲向敌人，以摧毁秃鹫及其骑手。敌人被击中后，一颗蛋会落到下方的某个平台上。英勇的骑士必须在蛋孵化出越来越难对付的新骑士之前将其摧毁。敌方骑士有三种类型：跳跃者（红骑士）、猎手（白骑士）和暗影领主（蓝骑士）。这些敌方骑士并非游戏中唯一的挑战。玩家还必须应对摇摇欲坠的平台、试图将骑士拖入火中的熔岩巨魔，以及可怕的“无敌”（？）翼龙。
这款游戏在当时很新颖，因为它是街机中为数不多的支持双人同时游玩的游戏之一。

NAME: Klax
DESC: An action/puzzle game, the object is to catch assorted color falling tiles and create rows, columns, or diagonals of a single color. Each level requires a different pattern to be made, and the tiles fall faster, more at a time, and in an increasing number of colors as the game progresses.
DESC_ZH: 这是一款动作/益智游戏，目标是接住各种颜色的下落方块，并组成单色的行、列或对角线。每个关卡都需要完成不同的图案，随着游戏的进行，方块下落速度会更快，一次下落的数量更多，颜色种类也会不断增加。

NAME: Krazy Ace Miniature Golf
DESC: Krazy Ace Miniature Golf is a miniature golf game for one to four players. You must hit the golf ball into the hole in the fewest shots while avoiding obstacles and traps. Try to get a better score than your opponent(s) or at least get within the number of shots per hole (par).
DESC_ZH: 《疯狂王牌迷你高尔夫》是一款支持1 - 4人游玩的迷你高尔夫游戏。你必须以最少的击球次数将高尔夫球打进洞中，同时避开障碍物和陷阱。试着比你的对手取得更高的分数，或者至少达到每个洞的标准击球数（标准杆）。

NAME: Kung Food
DESC: The ultimate food fight!  Mutant munchies from your freezer invade your kitchen, your life and your world.  Speed and your martial arts skills are required to overcome the vicious veggies!
DESC_ZH: 终极食物大战！从你冰箱里跑出来的变异零食入侵了你的厨房、你的生活，乃至你的世界。你需要速度和你的武术技能来战胜那些邪恶的蔬菜！

NAME: Lemmings
DESC:
Your task is to rescue the Lemmings across 120 levels of fast-paced puzzling. These creatures simply walk blindly through the world in the hope of reaching safety at the end of the level - unfortunately these levels include steep drops, gaps in the ground, barriers and rivers amongst other hazards.
You are in control not of any individual Lemming, but of a cross-hair, which can be moved over any of the Lemmings. Along the bottom are a selection of functions which can be assigned to a Lemming, including climbing, floating and bashing. You must click to select the appropriate function, then click on the Lemming to activate it. Each level has a different range of skills on offer, a different amount of Lemmings, and a different percentage target in order to progress.
DESC_ZH:
你的任务是在120个快节奏的解谜关卡中拯救旅鼠。这些小家伙只会盲目地在世界中穿行，希望能在关卡终点找到安全之所——不幸的是，这些关卡中存在着陡峭的落差、地面的缺口、障碍物和河流等各种危险。
你并不直接控制某只旅鼠，而是操控一个准星，它可以移动到任意一只旅鼠上方。屏幕底部有一系列功能可供选择，你可以将这些功能赋予旅鼠，包括攀爬、漂浮和撞击。你必须点击选择合适的功能，然后点击旅鼠来激活它。每个关卡提供的技能种类不同，旅鼠数量不同，通关所需拯救的旅鼠百分比目标也不同。

NAME: Loopz
DESC: It couldn't be simpler. You get pieces of different sizes and shapes. One by one you put them down on the playing board - soon you've made your first loop. Yeaaaah! Now it's not so easy. This time you didn't get the pieces you wanted. Never mind - just start another loop.All of a sudden the board's getting just a little too crowded. Now you're struggling to find a place to drop the pieces (who cares where they go, you can't afford to let the timer run down because you'll lose a life). Now it's getting really hectic. Did you honestly think this game was simple (and this is just the first level of Game A)? Pretty soon you'll be dreaming about Loopz. Wondering if next time you'll be able to make a longer loop than ever before - or more loops than your record. Will Loopz drive you crazy? You bet!
DESC_ZH: 再简单不过了。你会得到不同大小和形状的方块。你将它们逐个放在游戏板上——很快你就完成了第一个环。耶！现在可没那么容易了。这次你没拿到你想要的方块。没关系——那就再开始一个环。突然之间，游戏板变得有点太拥挤了。现在你得费劲地找地方放置方块（谁在乎它们放在哪儿呢，你可不能让计时器归零，因为你会失去一条命）。现在情况变得真的很紧张。你真的以为这个游戏很简单吗（而这还只是A模式的第一关）？很快你就会梦到《环环相扣》了。你会琢磨着下次能不能比以往做出更长的环——或者比你的纪录做出更多的环。《环环相扣》会把你逼疯吗？那肯定的！

NAME: Lynx Casino
DESC:
This game is a collection of casino games which are accessed by moving the player around the casino and selecting the preferred game table or machine to play that game. You start off with $1,000 to gamble with though you can get two loans of $500 if needed from the dealers. Once all your money has been gambled away it is game over.
The 5 games available are:
1. Blackjack
2. Craps
3. Roulette
4. Slot Machines (Fruit Machines)
5. Video Poker
DESC_ZH:
这款游戏是一款赌场游戏合集，玩家可以在赌场中移动，选择心仪的游戏桌或游戏机来进行游戏。游戏开始时，你会拥有 1000 美元用于赌博，如有需要，你还可以从庄家那里获得两笔 500 美元的贷款。一旦你输光了所有的钱，游戏就结束了。
现有 5 种游戏可供选择：
1. 21 点
2. 双骰子赌博
3. 轮盘赌
4. 老虎机（水果机）
5. 视频扑克

NAME: Malibu Bikini Volleyball
DESC: Welcome to Malibu: Volleyball capital of the world. This is where the best come to play--and show off their tans. If you want in, sign up. But keep your eyes on the ball...there'll be plenty of time for bikini-watching after the match!
DESC_ZH: 欢迎来到马里布：世界排球之都。这里是顶尖选手一展身手的地方——也是他们炫耀古铜色肌肤的舞台。如果你想加入，就赶紧报名吧。不过，可要紧盯住球……比赛结束后，有的是时间欣赏比基尼美女！

NAME: Marlboro Go!
DESC:
This game was a part of a promotion from Marlboro cigarettes where you could exchange points from cigarette packets for Marlboro branded items. The game came with a red Atari Lynx with 'Marlboro Abenteuer Team' branding written across the top. 
 
The game doesn't appear to be very complete, featuring only one track. It was released on a hand-etched PCB cartridge that was individually numbered. 
 
Note: Sometimes this pops up as 'Marlboro Man' and on a green PCB cartridge - these versions are fake reproductions, not the originals produced for the Marlboro competition.
DESC_ZH:
这款游戏是万宝路香烟促销活动的一部分，玩家可以用香烟包装上的积分兑换万宝路品牌商品。游戏配有一台红色的雅达利Lynx掌机，顶部印有“万宝路冒险团队”的品牌标识。

这款游戏似乎并不完整，只有一条赛道。它被发布在手工蚀刻的印刷电路板卡带上，且每盘卡带都有单独编号。

注意：有时会出现名为“万宝路牛仔”的版本，以及绿色印刷电路板卡带的版本——这些都是仿制品，并非为万宝路促销活动制作的原版游戏。

NAME: Mines 2
DESC: The goal of the game is to blow up or avoid bombs while making your way to the finish line. You can only blow up bombs that are directly in front of your tank (you need to be facing them).
DESC_ZH: 游戏的目标是在冲向终点线的过程中引爆炸弹或避开炸弹。你只能引爆坦克正前方的炸弹（你需要正对着它们）。

NAME: Ms. Pac-man
DESC:
In 1982, a sequel to the incredibly popular Pac-Man was introduced in the form of his girlfriend, Ms. Pac-Man. This sequel continued on the "eat the dots/avoid the ghosts" gameplay of the original game, but added new features to keep the title fresh. 
Like her boyfriend, Ms. Pac-Man attempts to clear four various and challenging mazes filled with dots and ever-moving bouncing fruit while avoiding Inky, Blinky, Pinky and Sue, each with their own personalities and tactics. One touch from any of these ghosts means a loss of life for Ms. Pac-Man.
DESC_ZH:
1982年，广受欢迎的《吃豆人》推出了续作，主角是吃豆人的女友——吃豆小姐。这款续作延续了原作“吃豆子，躲幽灵”的玩法，但增加了新元素，让游戏保持新鲜感。
和她的男友一样，吃豆小姐要在四个各具特色且充满挑战的迷宫中行动，这些迷宫里布满了豆子和不断移动的弹跳水果，同时她还要躲避墨鬼、闪鬼、粉鬼和苏鬼，每只幽灵都有自己的个性和战术。只要被任何一只幽灵碰到，吃豆小姐就会损失一条命。

NAME: Nfl Football
NAME_ZH: 美国国家橄榄球联盟橄榄球
DESC: NFL Football is an officially licensed NFL Americal football game. The game is played by holding the Lynx vertically and sports zooming and scaling graphical features, with an overhead, top-down view. Games last for four 15-minute quarters and it contains circa 25 offensive plays. Passing is done by holding down the B button and then moving a cross-hair to an open receiver, and then releasing the button to throw. Strategies can be changed in real-time. Two players can compete head-to-head with the ComLynx cable.
DESC_ZH: 《美国国家橄榄球联盟橄榄球》是一款获得美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）官方授权的美式橄榄球游戏。玩这款游戏时需将Lynx掌机竖着拿，游戏具备缩放图形效果，采用俯瞰视角。每场比赛分为四个15分钟的小节，包含约25种进攻战术。传球时，按住B键，然后将准星移向空位接球手，再松开按键即可传球。玩家可以实时改变策略。两名玩家可通过ComLynx连接线进行对战。

NAME: Ninja Gaiden
DESC:
Ninja Gaiden begins with a cinematic animation in which 2 ninjas duel to the death; one goes down. It is revealed that the doomed ninja is the father of Ryu Hayabusa. When Ryu learns of this, he embarks on a quest to find out who killed his father and why. This quest takes him to America to find an archaeologist with whom Ryu's father was working. From there, Ryu becomes embroiled in an evil, supernatural conspiracy involving a villain named Jaquio who has plans to use an ancient castle and some relics to unleash a terrifying evil upon the world.
Ninja Gaiden is a side scrolling game where Ryu the ninja can run, jump, and slash with his ninja sword. He can also attach to any vertical surface. Powerups are littered throughout the landscape that allow Ryu to toss fireballs and ninja stars, and perform other feats.
Ryu will battle through urban city settings, forests, jungles, snow covered castles, underground railroads, and ancient castles. A major feature in Ninja Gaiden are the cinematic scenes -- sometimes fullscreen -- through which the storyline unfolds.
DESC_ZH:
《忍者龙剑传》以一段过场动画开场，两名忍者进行生死决斗，其中一人倒下。后来揭示出这位命丧黄泉的忍者是隼龙的父亲。隼龙得知此事后，踏上了探寻杀害父亲之人及其动机的征程。为了寻找曾与父亲共事的考古学家，他前往美国。从那时起，隼龙卷入了一场邪恶的超自然阴谋，阴谋的主谋是一个名叫贾奎奥的反派，此人妄图利用一座古老城堡和一些遗物，将恐怖的邪恶力量释放到世间。
《忍者龙剑传》是一款横向卷轴游戏，玩家操控忍者隼龙，可以奔跑、跳跃，并用忍者刀进行砍杀。他还能攀附在任何垂直表面上。游戏场景中散落着各种道具，让隼龙能够发射火球和手里剑，还能施展其他技能。
隼龙将在城市、森林、丛林、冰雪城堡、地下铁路和古老城堡等场景中展开战斗。《忍者龙剑传》的一大特色是过场动画——有时是全屏的——剧情通过这些动画逐步展开。

FILE: Ninja Gaiden III - The Ancient Ship of Doom (USA, Europe).zip
NAME: Ninja Gaiden III : The Ancient Ship of Doom
NAME_ZH: 忍者龙剑传3：古代厄运之船
DESC: Immerse yourself in action-acked Ninja adventure as you help Ryu through his greatest challenge. Battle the hideous ancient forces of darkness to save mankind, with the epic adventure unfolding as you complete each level.
DESC_ZH: 在这场节奏紧凑的忍者冒险中，你将帮助龙隼迎接他最严峻的挑战。与邪恶的古代黑暗势力展开战斗，拯救人类。每完成一个关卡，一场史诗般的冒险便会逐步展开。

NAME: Ninja Nerd
DESC: Apparently this game became Fat Bobby, however the screenshots is very different between these two games, not to mention the way the character is controlled.
DESC_ZH: 显然，这款游戏后来演变成了《胖鲍比》，然而这两款游戏的截图差异很大，更不用说角色的操控方式了。

NAME: Pac-Land
DESC:
Pac-Land is a side-scrolling 1-2 player game with a cartoony feel to it. Now equipped with arms, face, and legs, Pac must guide a fairy back to her home in Fairy Land, but this task will not be easy because Inky, Blinky, Pinky, Clyde, and Sue will pursue Pac-Man as he travels through Pac-Land. When he finally transports the fairy back to her home, Pac is given some magic shoes, which will help him get to his own home, where he will be greeted by his family: Ms. Pac-Man, Baby Pac-Man, Chomp Chomp, and Sourpuss. 
There are sixteen rounds to complete, with four trips each. During each round, he can grab a power pellet, which cause ghosts to turn blue, allowing Pac-Man to eat them for points. Points are also awarded by collecting fruit that appear, like cherries and strawberries. In some rounds, Pac must use a springboard to jump over a lake. He must also make it to the end of each round before time runs out, otherwise a ghost will chase him.
DESC_ZH:
《吃豆人大陆》是一款带有卡通风格的横版卷轴 1 - 2 人游戏。现在吃豆人有了手臂、脸和腿，它必须护送一位仙女回到她在仙境的家，但这项任务并不容易，因为在吃豆人穿越吃豆人大陆的过程中，墨鬼、闪鬼、粉鬼、腥鬼和苏鬼会一直追捕它。当它最终将仙女送回家后，吃豆人会得到一双魔法鞋，这双鞋将帮助它回到自己的家，在那里它会受到家人的迎接：吃豆女郎、小吃豆人、咬咬和坏脾气鬼。

游戏共有 16 关，每关分四段行程。在每一轮中，它可以吃到一颗能量豆，这会让幽灵变成蓝色，这样吃豆人就可以吃掉它们来获得分数。收集出现的水果，如樱桃和草莓，也能获得分数。在某些关卡中，吃豆人必须使用跳板跳过湖泊。它还必须在每关时间结束前到达终点，否则会有幽灵追它。

NAME: Paperboy
DESC: Based on the arcade game, the object of Paperboy is to deliver papers to your customers while inflicting as much damage as possible to the houses of your non-customers. To make things more difficult, numerous obstacles get in your way including construction workers, rogue tires, skateboarders, dogs and cats, cars, and even the occasional tornado.
DESC_ZH: 这款游戏基于街机游戏改编，《报童》的目标是在尽可能多地破坏非客户房屋的同时，将报纸送到客户手中。为增加游戏难度，途中会有众多障碍，包括建筑工人、失控的轮胎、滑板爱好者、猫狗、汽车，甚至偶尔还会遇到龙卷风。

NAME: Pinball Jam
DESC:
Pinball Jam is a Lynx conversion of two pinball tables:  "Elvira and the Party Monsters" (Midway, 1989), and "Police Force" (Williams, 1989).  Both feature authentic table layouts, targets, and bonuses; the conversion of Elvira and the Party Monsters also features digitzed sound effects, including the voice of Cassandra Peterson (Elvira).
Each table scrolls up and down during gameplay (as opposed to just "snapping" to a new area as the ball reaches it).
DESC_ZH:
《弹珠台狂欢》是两款弹珠台游戏在Lynx主机上的移植版本：《埃尔维拉与派对怪兽》（米德韦公司，1989年）和《警察部队》（威廉姆斯公司，1989年）。两款游戏都具备真实的台面布局、目标和奖励；《埃尔维拉与派对怪兽》的移植版本还采用了数字化音效，包括卡珊德拉·彼得森（埃尔维拉的扮演者）的配音。

在游戏过程中，每个台面都会上下滚动（而不是当球到达新区域时才“切换”到该区域）。

NAME: Pit-fighter
DESC: Pit-Fighter is a 3rd-person fight game that features digitized graphics of real fighters and zooming effects.  Players select one of three fighters (Buzz, Ty or Kato) to take on anyone who dares. At the conclusion of a match, players are individually awarded a Knockout Bonus, Brutality Bonus, and a Fight Purse. Every third match is a Grudge Match where players test the skills of each other. The last man standing is the winner of this three-knockdown match. Players fight their way to the Elimination Match to decide who wins the opportunity to dethrone the champion, the Masked Warrior.
DESC_ZH: 《角斗场斗士》是一款第三人称格斗游戏，采用了真实格斗选手的数字化图像和缩放特效。玩家可以从三名格斗选手（巴斯、泰伊或卡托）中选择一位，迎战任何敢于挑战的对手。每场比赛结束后，玩家将分别获得击倒奖励、残暴奖励和比赛奖金。每三场比赛会有一场恩怨赛，玩家可以在这场比赛中切磋技艺。在这场三回合淘汰赛中，最后站着的人就是胜者。玩家需要一路过关斩将，进入淘汰赛，以决定谁有机会击败冠军——蒙面战士。

NAME: Poker
DESC:
Transform your Lynx into a virtual casino! 
 
Experience all the excitement of a live poker game combined with the convenience of portable gameplay. Poker features large on-screen graphics, a variety of options, and an assortment of animation and sound effects that bring the game to life!
DESC_ZH:
将你的Lynx掌机变成一座虚拟赌场！

体验现场扑克游戏的所有刺激，同时享受便携游戏的便利。《扑克》拥有大屏幕图形、多种选项以及各种动画和音效，让游戏栩栩如生！

NAME: Pounce!
DESC:
This game stars Pounce, a cute little green dragon (who is the Lock Ness Monster), in a platform and maze adventure. 
 
To get to the play field, climb the tree on the right side of the second screen, or go to the far left side of the screen and drop onto the X Y tilt table play field with holes and guide side walls. As Pounce drops onto the play field he turns into a spinning marble and your job is to guide him around the X Y tilt play field and avoid the holes.
DESC_ZH:
这款游戏的主角是猛扑，一只可爱的小绿龙（它其实是尼斯湖水怪），展开一场平台与迷宫冒险。

要进入游戏场地，你可以爬上第二屏右侧的树，或者走到屏幕最左侧，然后落到带有孔洞和导向侧壁的 XY 倾斜桌面游戏场地。当猛扑落到游戏场地时，它会变成一颗旋转的弹珠，你的任务是引导它在 XY 倾斜游戏场地中移动，避开那些孔洞。

NAME: Power Factor
DESC:
Power Factor is an action-platformer starring the single campily-named hero, Redd Ace, fighting alien creatures known as the Ceegarians from the Ceeg dimension.  Of course, aliens being played out, the Ceegarians are actually referred to as "transdimensional intruders," and the Ceegarian creatures the player faces off against are referred to as evil invading "Sinlendo Techmods."  
The primary goal of the game is to work through stages and bosses essentially to build a bomb to destroy the Ceegarians. Pertaining to the bomb, there are six components.  The entire game takes place within, as the box refers to it, "our dimension's reactor."  As such, the environments of the game are aimed to look like the inside of a machine.  To further convolute the storyline, the instruction manual actually refers to the game itself as a Virtual Reality simulation the player is experiencing in the future, based on the exploits of Redd Ace, and you’re meandering through this simulator on the “famous Atarian Leisure Moon.”  
Stages are fairly small, but designed like a maze à la Metroid.  However, unlike Metroid, completed areas cannot be revisited.  Each stage ends with a boss battle showcasing enemy characters that are often two screens high.
Redd Ace is armed with a multi-use weapon known as the "Tmat MOW."  Tmat MOW is intended to be short for “TRANSMAT Multi-Ordinance Weapon.”  Four different weapons may be acquired and used for both the A and B buttons, with eight total weapons in the game, and one gun as a standard.  Other weapons include lasers, a flame thrower, missiles, bombs, and the like.  Weapons must be picked up through playing the stages and collecting various weapon icons.  Once the ammunition is used, the weapon is gone and must be recollected.  As such, weapon pick-ups must be used sparingly, especially since most contain very small numbers of ammunition, often as low as two shots.  Choosing weapons is awkwardly assigned to the Directional-pad, which is also where character movement is assigned.  Tapping the D-pad allows the player to select different weapons, while holding it down moves Redd.
Controlling Redd Ace is somewhat different from a typical platformer of the era. There is no jump button, as both the A and B buttons have weapons assigned to them.  Instead, our hero is also armed with a levitation pack on his back, which allows flight.  Tapping "up" on the D-Pad allows Redd to jump, while holding "up" activates the levitator and allows Redd to fly.  Aside from a health bar, there is also a fuel bar showing that flight isn't a luxury to be wasted.  When crouching, Redd automatically aims upwards at a 45-degree angle, rather than straight ahead.
Pressing the "Option 2" button allows the player to see a menu with information about the bomb pieces the player is collecting, as well as details on the various weapons.  If the player is standing in front of a computer monitor when Option 2 is pressed, the menu shows a map of the current area, and information on enemy characters.
The player starts with three lives, and there are no continues.  There are, however, three difficulty modes--Easy, Normal, and Hard—which may be selected prior to gameplay.
DESC_ZH:
《能量因子》是一款动作平台游戏，主角是名字夸张的英雄雷德·艾斯，他要与来自西格维度、名为西格人的外星生物战斗。当然，由于外星生物题材已被用滥，西格人实际上被称为“跨维度入侵者”，玩家要对抗的西格生物则被称为邪恶入侵的“辛伦多科技魔怪”。
游戏的主要目标是通关各个关卡和击败首领，以收集材料制造炸弹来消灭西格人。制造炸弹需要六种组件。整个游戏都发生在包装盒中所说的“我们维度的反应堆”内。因此，游戏环境设计得像机器内部。为了让剧情更加复杂，游戏说明书实际上将游戏本身描述为玩家在未来体验的虚拟现实模拟，基于雷德·艾斯的冒险经历，而你正在“著名的阿塔里休闲卫星”上的这个模拟器中探索。
关卡规模相当小，但设计得像《银河战士》那样的迷宫。不过，与《银河战士》不同的是，已通关的区域无法再次进入。每个关卡的结尾都是一场首领战，首领角色通常有两个屏幕那么高。
雷德·艾斯配备了一种多功能武器，名为“传送多用途武器（Tmat MOW）”。“Tmat MOW”是“传送多用途武器（TRANSMAT Multi - Ordinance Weapon）”的缩写。玩家可以获取并使用四种不同的武器，分别对应A键和B键，游戏中共有八种武器，还有一把枪作为标配。其他武器包括激光枪、火焰喷射器、导弹、炸弹等等。武器必须通过玩关卡并收集各种武器图标来获得。一旦弹药耗尽，武器就会消失，必须重新收集。因此，拾取的武器必须谨慎使用，尤其是因为大多数武器的弹药数量非常少，有时低至只有两发。选择武器的操作尴尬地分配给了方向键，而角色移动也是通过方向键控制。轻按方向键可以让玩家选择不同的武器，按住则可以移动雷德。
控制雷德·艾斯与那个时代的典型平台游戏有所不同。没有跳跃按钮，因为A键和B键都分配了武器功能。相反，我们的英雄背上还配备了一个悬浮背包，允许他飞行。在方向键上轻按“上”键，雷德可以跳跃，按住“上”键则激活悬浮装置，让雷德飞行。除了血条之外，还有一个燃料条，表明飞行不是可以随意浪费的能力。当雷德蹲下时，他会自动向上呈45度角瞄准，而不是向前直瞄。
按下“选项2”按钮，玩家可以看到一个菜单，其中包含玩家正在收集的炸弹组件信息，以及各种武器的详细信息。如果玩家在按下“选项2”时站在电脑显示器前，菜单会显示当前区域的地图和敌人角色的信息。
玩家初始有三条命，且没有续关。不过，游戏有三种难度模式——简单、普通和困难——玩家可以在游戏开始前选择。

NAME: Puzzler 2000
DESC: Puzzle game similar to Tetris and Dr. Mario. In this game, blocks of different colours fall from the upper part of the screen, and the player must connect them in groups of four to make them disappear from the screen.
DESC_ZH: 一款类似于《俄罗斯方块》和《马里奥医生》的益智游戏。在这款游戏中，不同颜色的方块从屏幕上方落下，玩家必须将它们四个一组连接起来，使其从屏幕上消失。

NAME: Qix
DESC: In this game, you guide a marker which must draw rectangles and other weird objects in order to claim your territory, and you can either draw these rectangles fast or slow. Drawing the rectangles using the "slow" method awards you the most points. Once a rectangle has been made, it will be colored in to show that you have claimed your territory. While drawing the rectangles, you need to watch out for Qix (pronounced "kicks"), a series of colored lines that crawl the screen. In addition to Qix, you also need to avoid the Sparks who travel around the border, as well as any lines that you have made, as well as The Fuse, who travels along the line that you are drawing. Once you have claimed enough territory, you proceed to the next level.
DESC_ZH: 在这款游戏中，你要操控一个标记，必须绘制矩形和其他奇特的图形来占领你的领地，你可以快速或缓慢地绘制这些矩形。使用“慢速”方法绘制矩形能获得最多的分数。一旦绘制出一个矩形，它就会被填充颜色，表明你已占领该领地。在绘制矩形时，你需要留意奇克斯（发音为“kicks”），这是一系列在屏幕上移动的彩色线条。除了奇克斯，你还需要避开在边界游走的火花，以及你自己绘制的任何线条，还有沿着你正在绘制的线条移动的导火索。一旦你占领了足够的领地，就可以进入下一关。

NAME: Raiden
DESC:
In the year 2090, Earth is invaded by extra-terrestrials. The World Alliance of Nations has developed a supersonic attack fighter, Raiden, to defend the Earth. A pilot must take control of the experimental fighter to destroy the alien warships that just happen to look like odd variations of typical military tanks and planes with gadgets attached to them. 
Raiden (called Raiden Trad on the Genesis and SNES) is an over-head vertical-scrolling shooter, based on an arcade game of the same title. It features two forms of weapon upgrades and two types of missiles (normal or homing). You start the game with several bombs which you can use to destroy most enemies on the screen to get yourself out of a jam. Each level ends with a large boss or bosses.
DESC_ZH:
2090年，地球遭到外星人入侵。世界国家联盟研制出了一款超音速攻击战斗机——“雷电”，用于保卫地球。一名飞行员必须操控这架实验性战斗机，摧毁那些外形酷似普通军事坦克和飞机、还附带各种装置的外星战舰。
“雷电”（在世嘉Genesis和任天堂超级任天堂主机上被称为“雷电传统版”）是一款基于同名街机游戏的俯视角纵向卷轴射击游戏。它有两种武器升级形式和两种导弹（普通导弹或追踪导弹）。游戏开始时你会拥有数枚炸弹，你可以用它们摧毁屏幕上的大多数敌人，让自己摆脱困境。每一关的结尾都会有一个或多个大型首领。

NAME: Rampage
DESC:
George, Lizzy and Ralph were just ordinary Americans, until an experiment went wrong, turning them into a Gorilla, Lizard and Werewolf respectively. Following this, the three of them plan to go round destroying buildings, and up to 3 human players can join in.
Smashing at the edges of the buildings for long enough will make them collapse. The police and military are after you, and will shoot at you, so try to destroy them (failing that, you can avoid the bullets). You will need to eat regularly, with things like plants on offer, to avoid shrinking back to being human
DESC_ZH:
乔治、莉齐和拉尔夫原本只是普通的美国人，直到一场实验出了差错，他们分别变成了大猩猩、蜥蜴和狼人。此后，他们三人打算四处破坏建筑物，最多可有三名人类玩家加入。

持续破坏建筑物的边缘，足够长的时间后，建筑物就会倒塌。警察和军队在追捕你，还会向你开枪，所以要设法消灭他们（如果做不到，也可以躲避子弹）。你需要定期进食，比如吃些植物，以免变回人类。

NAME: Rampart
DESC: Tetris meets shoot-'em-up, Rampart was originally a one or two-player arcade game combining strategy and artillery action. Build your castle from Tetris-style pieces, place your cannons, bombard the enemy, try to repair, do it all over again. Later arcade revisions incorporated 3-player,  and the PC conversion does as well, making it a faithful, entertaining classic for multiple players on the same PC.
DESC_ZH: 这是一款结合了俄罗斯方块和射击玩法的游戏。《堡垒》最初是一款单人或双人街机游戏，融合了策略和火炮战斗元素。你可以用俄罗斯方块风格的方块来建造你的城堡，布置你的火炮，轰炸敌人，尝试修复城堡，然后循环往复。后来的街机版本增加了三人模式，电脑版也同样支持，这使得它成为了一款适合在同一台电脑上多人游玩的经典佳作，充满乐趣。

NAME: Road Riot 4WD
DESC: Road Riot 4WD is a Driving game, developed and published by Tengen, which was cancelled before it was released.
DESC_ZH: 《四驱公路狂飙》是一款由天根公司（Tengen）开发并发行的驾驶游戏，该游戏在发布前被取消。

NAME: Roadblasters
DESC:
RoadBlasters is a futuristic racing action game. The goal is to reach the finish line in one piece throughout each of 50 levels. Numerous enemies are out on the road to try and stop you, including armored cars, motorcycles, canons on the side of the road, landmines, and more. 
Your vehicle is equipped with a machine gun to help you out, and occasionally a weapons plane will fly in and drop additional power ups that can be collected. Some of these are the U.Z. canon, cruise missiles, and speed boost. Your car has a very limited amount of fuel, however more can be picked up along the way by crossing the halfway point of a level, or by collecting the red and green fuel spheres that appear in the road or after destroying certain enemies.  On many levels collecting fuel is critical otherwise you won't be able to reach the finish line.
DESC_ZH:
《公路爆破手》是一款未来风格的赛车动作游戏。游戏目标是在全部50个关卡中毫发无损地抵达终点线。道路上有众多敌人试图阻止你，包括装甲车、摩托车、路边的加农炮、地雷等等。
你的载具配备了一挺机枪来助你一臂之力，偶尔还会有武器补给飞机飞来，投下可收集的额外道具。其中一些道具包括U.Z.加农炮、巡航导弹和加速道具。不过，你的汽车燃料非常有限，但你可以在关卡过半时补充燃料，或者收集道路上出现的、或是击败特定敌人后掉落的红绿燃料球来获取更多燃料。在许多关卡中，收集燃料至关重要，否则你将无法到达终点线。

NAME: Robo-Squash
DESC:
Experience the Ultimate Zero-G Futuresport. 
 
Take the challenge of multi-dimensional competition. Control and aim your racquet to deflect the ball as it comes at you. Hit exploding bricks and special items for power ups. Miss the ball and you'll be splattered! 
 
You and a friend can "Lynx up" for an awesome two player challenge. 
 
- Two player "Comlynx" Capability!
DESC_ZH:
体验终极零重力未来运动。

迎接多维竞赛的挑战。当球朝你飞来时，控制并瞄准你的球拍将球击回。击中爆炸砖块和特殊道具可获得能力提升。没接住球，你就会被溅得满身！

你可以和朋友“连接利克斯机”，开启精彩的双人挑战。

- 支持双人“利克斯机联网”！

NAME: Robotron : 2084
DESC: In 2084, man creates a species of super-advanced cyborgs known as Robotrons. Recognizing the imperfect nature of their creators, the Robotrons conclude that the inefficient human race must be exterminated. Only you and a single family of clones remain. If mankind is to survive, you must destroy the Grunts, Brains, Enforcers, and Tanks - but avoid the indestructible Hulks at all cost. Can you withstand wave after wave of android invasion... before it's too late?
DESC_ZH: 在2084年，人类创造了一种超级先进的半机械人种族，名为机械战警。机械战警意识到其创造者的不完美本质后，得出结论：低效的人类必须被消灭。如今，仅剩下你和一个克隆人家庭。若人类想要生存，你就必须摧毁喽啰、大脑怪、执法者和坦克怪——但无论如何都要避开那些坚不可摧的巨人怪。在一切为时已晚之前，你能否抵御一波又一波的机器人入侵呢？

NAME: Rolling Thunder
DESC:
Rolling Thunder is a side-scrolling action game. The player takes control of a secret agent who must rescue his female partner from a terrorist organization. 
 
Note: This game was never completed for the Atari Lynx.
DESC_ZH:
《雷电》是一款横向卷轴动作游戏。玩家将操控一名特工，他必须从一个恐怖组织手中营救他的女性搭档。

注意：这款游戏从未在雅达利Lynx掌机上完成开发。

NAME: Rygar
DESC:
An evil being known as Ligar is about to conquer the land of Argool. Such is his power that no living creature dares to cross paths with him. But the legendary warrior Rygar rises from his grave to restore peace and justice. Armed with his famed weapon Diskarmor, Rygar begins to traverse the vast lands that lead to the lair of the demon, as his minions are trying in vain to stop him...
Originally released on the arcades, Rygar is a side-scrolling action game. The player controls the titular hero, advancing through stages populated by hostile creatures. Beside the Diskarmor, a weapon that looks like a shield with a chain attached to it, the hero can use a variety of other weapons, including projectiles that can be fired in four directions. Various "powers" are scattered through the levels and can be collected. The effects of these powers include increasing the fire power of the equipped weapon, adding time to the clock, temporary invisibility, extra points, etc.
DESC_ZH:
一个名为利加尔的邪恶存在即将征服阿尔古尔之地。他的力量如此强大，以至于没有生物敢与他为敌。但传奇战士龙战士从坟墓中崛起，以恢复和平与正义。龙战士手持他著名的武器圆盘铠甲，开始穿越通往恶魔巢穴的广袤土地，而恶魔的爪牙们却徒劳地试图阻止他……

《龙战士》最初在街机上发布，是一款横向卷轴动作游戏。玩家控制主角英雄，在布满敌对生物的关卡中前进。除了圆盘铠甲（一种看起来像盾牌且带有链条的武器）之外，英雄还可以使用各种其他武器，包括能向四个方向发射的投射物。各种“能量道具”散布在各个关卡中，玩家可以收集它们。这些能量道具的效果包括增强所装备武器的火力、增加游戏时间、获得短暂隐身效果、额外加分等等。

NAME: S.T.U.N. Runner
DESC: Pit your skills against earth invaders in the 25th century! You'll need all your driving skills in the narrow, twisting underground tunnels of the subterranean network. Destroy your enemies and advance your speed to incredible levels. Beat the clock and become the best there is - S.T.U.N. Runner!
DESC_ZH: 在25世纪，用你的技能对抗地球入侵者！在地底网络狭窄曲折的地下隧道中，你需要运用你所有的驾驶技巧。摧毁你的敌人，将你的速度提升到惊人的水平。与时间赛跑，成为最棒的——震撼奔跑者！

NAME: Scrapyard Dog
DESC: In Scrapyard Dog you play the role of Louie, the junkyard guy, who's companion Scraps has been dognapped by the dastardly Mr. Big. Louie has bombs and cans at his disposal to use against the enemies, which include gangsters, rats, and mice. He can also use shields to protect himself on route to the sixteen checkpoints in the game. Louie must reach each checkpoint in a certain amount of time in order to save Scraps.
DESC_ZH: 在《废车场神犬》中，你将扮演废品场工人路易，他的伙伴斯克莱普斯被卑鄙的比格先生绑架了。路易可以使用炸弹和罐头来对抗敌人，敌人包括歹徒、老鼠等。在前往游戏中的十六个关卡的途中，他还可以使用盾牌保护自己。为了救出斯克莱普斯，路易必须在规定时间内到达每个关卡。

NAME: Shadow Of The Beast
DESC:
While very young, Aarbron was kidnapped and enslaved by the Priests of the Beast Lord. He grew up on drugs made to destroy his own will and turn him into the Beast Messenger, a powerful creature serving Maletoth, The Beast Lord himself. He did his job, until one day he noticed a man about to be sacrificed in a ritual, his face triggering ancient memories... and as the sacrificial knife descended into the man's body, Aarbron recognizes the face... Of his father! 
As his father dies in the altar, memories of his childhood and tormented past at the hands of the Beast Lord emerged, and as feelings of hate over his captors took over him, he swore revenge and fled the temple, knowing the road to avenge his father and redemption would be hard.
DESC_ZH:
在很小的时候，阿尔布伦就被兽王祭司绑架并奴役。他在一种能摧毁自身意志的药物的影响下长大，被变成了兽王使者，一个为兽王马勒托斯效力的强大生物。他一直履行着自己的职责，直到有一天，他看到一个男人即将在一场仪式中被献祭，那张脸勾起了他古老的回忆……当献祭的刀刺进男人的身体时，阿尔布伦认出了那张脸……那是他的父亲！
当他的父亲在祭坛上死去时，他童年的记忆以及在兽王手中遭受折磨的痛苦过往浮现出来。仇恨俘虏他的人的情绪占据了他的内心，他发誓要复仇，然后逃离了神庙，他知道为父报仇并自我救赎的道路将会艰难无比。

NAME: Shanghai
DESC:
Shanghai is a tile-based game based on the ancient Chinese game of Mah-Jong - this was the first of many computer versions.
The gameplay involves 144 tiles, each depicting different images, which have to be removed by matching them into pairs. The tiles are arranged in a gridded pattern, which is higher near the centre. A tile can only be removed if it has no tile next to it on at least one side.
This computer implementation can generate a random board layout to take on, as well as featuring 5 preset challenges, some of which have time limits of 5 or 10 minutes, as well as a multiplayer mode.
DESC_ZH:
上海麻将连连看是一款基于中国古老麻将游戏的图块游戏——这是众多电脑版本中的第一个。
游戏玩法涉及144个图块，每个图块都描绘着不同的图案，玩家需要将它们两两配对来消除。图块以网格形式排列，中心附近的堆叠较高。只有当一个图块至少有一侧没有相邻图块时，才能将其消除。
这个电脑版游戏可以生成随机的棋盘布局供玩家挑战，还设有5个预设挑战，其中一些有5分钟或10分钟的时间限制，此外还有多人游戏模式。

NAME: Spacewar
DESC:
Space War is a video game cartridge for the Atari 2600, released in 1978 by Atari, Inc. It's an Atari 2600 version of Spacewar!, the 1962 computer game by Steve Russell. 
 
This version for Atari Lynx was never released.
DESC_ZH:
《太空战争》是雅达利公司于1978年为雅达利2600游戏机发行的一款游戏卡带。它是1962年史蒂夫·拉塞尔开发的电脑游戏《太空战争！》的雅达利2600版本。

这个雅达利Lynx版本从未发布过。

NAME: Steel Talons
DESC:
Steel Talons brought realism-oriented helicopter combat to the arcades, and later to home systems. The action is viewed from behind your helicopter, with the 3D polygon world rotating around you, taking in mountains, rivers and deserts. 
There are 12 missions in total, each of which requires you to destroy targets in a set time limit. There are also training and head-to-head (against a CPU-controlled drone) modes. 
You have a limited number of automatically-targeting missiles as well as a cannon. A tracking map tells you where you are on the level, and where the enemies are.Contact with the ground, mountains or other vehicles will damage or destroy your helicopter.
DESC_ZH:
《钢铁利爪》将注重真实感的直升机空战玩法引入了街机，随后又引入了家用机平台。游戏以你所操控直升机的后方视角呈现，3D多边形世界围绕着你旋转，展现出山脉、河流和沙漠等场景。

游戏总共有12个任务，每个任务都要求你在规定时间内摧毁目标。此外，还有训练模式和对战（对抗电脑控制的无人机）模式。

你拥有数量有限的自动寻的导弹以及一门机炮。一张跟踪地图会显示你在关卡中的位置以及敌人的所在之处。与地面、山脉或其他载具发生碰撞会损坏或摧毁你的直升机。

NAME: Super Asteroids & Missile Command
NAME_ZH: 超级小行星与导弹防御
DESC:
Two classic Atari arcade games were updated for this compilation. This Lynx version of Asteroids and Missile Command contains some enhanced features to justify the "super" in the title. 
 
Super Asteroids has all new graphics to replace the vector outlines of the original. Your ship has a shield that can absorb several collisions before it blows up. There are also power ups to increase your firepower. 
 
Super Missile Command also has all new graphics. Between rounds, you can trade credits earned during gameplay to purchase special weapons that will help you later in the game.
DESC_ZH:
本合集对两款经典的雅达利街机游戏进行了更新。《小行星》和《导弹防御》的这款林克斯掌机版本具备一些增强功能，这也解释了标题中的“超级”二字。

《超级小行星》采用了全新的图形，取代了原版的矢量轮廓。你的飞船有一个护盾，在爆炸前可以承受多次碰撞。还有增强道具来提升你的火力。

《超级导弹防御》同样采用了全新的图形。在各轮游戏之间，你可以用游戏过程中赚取的积分来购买特殊武器，这些武器将在后续游戏中助你一臂之力。

NAME: Super Off Road
DESC:
Pile into the pickup and head for the stadium, it's time for some mud- 
stompin' action with SUPER OFF-ROAD.  In this Lynx version of the Tradewest 
arcade game, four racers drive monster trucks around a variety of dirt tracks. 
Players must deal with ramps, hills, valleys, and more as they race for the 
finish, while trying to pick up extra money and nitro boosts along the way. 
Then they take those winnings to the shop to buy better equipment before the 
next race begins.  Up to four Lynxes can be connected for multi-player 
competition.
DESC_ZH: 跳进皮卡，前往体育场，是时候用《超级越野赛车》来一场泥地狂飙了。在这款Tradewest街机游戏的Lynx版本中，四名车手驾驶着怪物卡车在各种泥土赛道上飞驰。玩家在冲向终点的过程中，必须应对坡道、山丘、山谷等各种地形，同时还要沿途拾取额外的金钱和氮气加速道具。然后，他们可以用这些 winnings 去商店购买更好的装备，为下一场比赛做准备。最多可以连接四台Lynx主机进行多人对战。

NAME: Super Skweek
DESC:
Super Skweek is a game inspired by the wide success of Chip's Challenge, and share some elements of that puzzler while combining other elements from games such as Pengo.
In Super Skweek, you play the title character who must walk around and either paint all the tiles of the game board pink, complete a specific mission, or both.  Some tiles react in various ways when you walk on them, like exploding.  
Unlike Chip's Challenge, the game plays in realtime and you can pick up and use weapons to keep away certain monsters as you paint the tiles.  There is also a shop you can enter to purchase items.  Finally, levels have a time limit for completion.
DESC_ZH:
《超级斯奎克》是一款受《奇普的挑战》巨大成功启发的游戏，它融合了该解谜游戏的一些元素，同时还结合了《企鹅方块》等游戏的其他元素。
在《超级斯奎克》中，你将扮演主角，必须四处走动，要么将游戏棋盘上的所有方块涂成粉色，要么完成特定任务，或者两者皆要完成。 当你踩在某些方块上时，它们会以各种方式做出反应，比如爆炸。 
与《奇普的挑战》不同的是，这款游戏是实时进行的，在你给方块涂色时，你可以捡起并使用武器来击退某些怪物。 此外，还有一家商店可供你进入购买物品。 最后，每个关卡都有完成时间限制。

NAME: SwitchBlade II
DESC:
As Hiro, you must once again defeat the ninja lord Havok. Using shurikens and other weapons (knife, homing missiles, laser beam, flamethrower ...), you must defeat Havok's henchmen to reach him. 
Switchblade II is a side-scrolling platformer and features six levels infested with metal-clad mechanoid enemies. One of the key aspects of the game is obtaining coins from defeated enemies, which can be exchanged in stores for extra lives, energy and weapons. 
The graphics have a very Japanese, manga-like style.
DESC_ZH:
作为宏，你必须再次击败忍者领主浩劫。使用飞镖和其他武器（刀、寻的导弹、激光束、火焰喷射器……），你必须击败浩劫的手下才能找到他。
飞刀手2是一款横向卷轴平台游戏，有六个关卡，里面布满了金属外壳的机械敌人。这款游戏的一个关键要素是从被击败的敌人那里获得金币，这些金币可以在商店里兑换额外的生命、能量和武器。
游戏画面具有浓郁的日本漫画风格。

NAME: Todd's Adventures In Slime World
DESC:
While flying your spaceship, you crash land on a planet covered entirely in slime.  You and a friend explore the labyrinthine planet of slime, armed with a water pistol and all manner of gadgets you find along the way in an effort to find your way back out.  The game world is a giant maze with quirky hidden areas and plenty of original layout ideas.  Depending on the game mode, you are either cooperating or competing with your "friend" to find and get to an exit first.  Due to the massive sizes of the slime worlds (about 6 entries to choose from), games often take several hours to complete.
The basis of the game is exploration, with varying game modes further focusing on competition, puzzle solving, speed, exploration, or cooperation.
DESC_ZH:
驾驶宇宙飞船时，你迫降在了一个完全被黏液覆盖的星球上。你和一位朋友手持水枪，带着一路上找到的各种小工具，探索这个迷宫般的黏液星球，试图找到出去的路。游戏世界是一个巨大的迷宫，有奇特的隐藏区域和大量新颖的布局创意。根据游戏模式的不同，你要么和“朋友”合作，要么和“朋友”竞争，看谁能先找到并到达出口。由于黏液世界规模巨大（大约有6个入口可供选择），游戏往往需要花费数小时才能完成。
游戏的基础玩法是探索，不同的游戏模式会进一步侧重于竞争、解谜、速度、探索或合作。

NAME: Toki
DESC:
The hero of the game is a young jungle-man named Toki. One day the evil wizard Dr. Stark kidnaps his girlfriend Wanda. When Toki tries to save her, he is turned into a monkey! Now Toki has to find Dr. Stark in his palace, to rescue Wanda, and to become a human being again!
It is a platform game with a lot of various levels: jungle, underwater, volcanic caves, on the ice... Toki's only weapons are spitting on the enemies or jumping on them and crashing them. There are many possibilities to upgrade his spitting "weapon";  for example, if he finds an upgrade, he can spit fireballs. 
This game is ported from an older arcade version.
DESC_ZH:
游戏的主角是一位名叫托奇的年轻丛林人。一天，邪恶巫师斯塔克博士绑架了他的女友旺达。当托奇试图营救她时，他被变成了一只猴子！现在，托奇必须在斯塔克博士的宫殿里找到他，救出旺达，并重新变回人类！
这是一款拥有众多不同关卡的平台游戏：丛林、水下、火山洞穴、冰原……托奇唯一的武器是向敌人吐口水，或者跳到他们身上将其撞翻。他有很多升级吐口水“武器”的方法；例如，如果他找到升级道具，就可以吐出火球。
这款游戏是从早期街机版移植而来的。

NAME: Tournament Cyberball 2072
DESC: Journey into the future of football with this cult, arcade classic. Enjoy robotic action against the computer or ComLynx? up to four players and play head-to-head with your friends. Earn money for completed plays which can be used to power-up your team, replace broken players, and upgrade to bigger and more advanced players. Awesome football action!
DESC_ZH: 借助这款经典街机游戏，开启足球的未来之旅。你可以与电脑进行机器人对战，也能通过ComLynx与多达四名玩家联机，与你的朋友进行面对面较量。完成比赛即可赚取金钱，这些钱可用于强化你的球队、替换损坏的球员，还能升级为更强大、更先进的球员。超棒的足球对决！

NAME: T-Tris
DESC:
It plays like most Tetris games. Pressing down throws down the blocks, and so does pressing A which is quite annoying until you get used to it. The B button rotates the blocks, but as in a few other Tetris games you can't rotate once your block is pressed against the wall. It's a bit tedious to move, holding left or right moves you in that direction but very slowly, to speed it up you have to tap left or right which gets harder the faster it gets.. 
 
You have the option to start the game on various levels, it shows you how much time has passed, how many lines you've cleared, the points, level, high score and how many players. It apparently has a multiplayer function, I haven't tried this out yet, I don't have the Comlynx cable and I'm not sure whether it demands several copies of the game or not.. On the right side of the screen you see how many of each type of block you've received, at the bottom it reads ?PREV? which my brain wants to interpret to ?Previous?, but it probably stands for ?Preview?. It shows the next block either way, and it's quite annoying since I'm used to having that one on the top, so every time I glanced to see what was next I kept seeing that same top block XD 
There's no music, only some sound effects and a very German voice saying ?Oh toll!? (which translates to ?Oh cool?) when you do something good XD It gets almost impossible when you go above level 9, it's so slow to  move the blocks left or right and they kind of stick as soon as they touch another block.. but I'm still happy to have a Tetris game for the Atari Lynx!! Thanks Bastion for creating this ^_^
DESC_ZH:
它的玩法和大多数俄罗斯方块游戏类似。按下向下键会让方块下落，按下A键也会让方块下落，在你习惯之前，这有点烦人。B键用于旋转方块，但和其他一些俄罗斯方块游戏一样，当方块贴墙时就无法旋转了。移动方块有点麻烦，按住左键或右键会让方块朝相应方向移动，但速度非常慢，要加快速度就得快速点击左键或右键，而且游戏速度越快，操作就越难。

你可以选择在不同的关卡开始游戏，游戏会显示已过去的时间、消除的行数、得分、关卡、最高分以及玩家数量。显然它有多人游戏功能，我还没试过，我没有Comlynx连接线，也不确定是否需要多份游戏拷贝。在屏幕右侧，你可以看到每种类型的方块各收到了多少个，屏幕底部显示“PREV”，我觉得它可能是“Previous”（上一个）的意思，但它可能代表“Preview”（预览）。不管怎样，它显示的是下一个方块，这有点烦人，因为我习惯了预览方块显示在顶部，所以每次我瞥一眼看下一个方块是什么时，看到的总是顶部那个方块，哈哈。

游戏没有音乐，只有一些音效，当你做出出色操作时，会有一个很有德国口音的声音说“Oh toll!”（意思是“哦，太酷了！”）。当你玩到9关以上时，游戏几乎变得无法玩了，左右移动方块非常慢，而且方块一旦碰到其他方块就好像粘住了一样……但我还是很高兴能有一款适合雅达利Lynx掌机的俄罗斯方块游戏！感谢Bastion制作了这款游戏，^_^

NAME: Turbo Sub
DESC: Turbo Sub released in 1985 as an arcade shooter game by Entertainment Sciences. Then later in 1991 for the Atari Lynx. The arcade version was a one player game set in the future where you control a submersible ship against a horde of aliens. The Atari Lynx version is the same but can be played with two players and tells us the story is set in the 28th century on Earth. The planet has been invaded and the goal of the game is that the player must destroy all the aliens.
DESC_ZH: 《涡轮潜艇》是娱乐科学公司于1985年推出的一款街机射击游戏。后来在1991年又推出了雅达利Lynx掌机版本。街机版是单人游戏，背景设定在未来，玩家操控一艘潜水船对抗成群的外星人。雅达利Lynx版玩法相同，但支持双人游玩，故事背景设定在28世纪的地球。地球遭到了入侵，游戏目标是玩家必须消灭所有外星人。

NAME: Viking Child
DESC:
Mainly titled Prophecy I - The Viking Child is a game created by Imagitec Design Limited on Amiga, Atari ST, Atari Lynx, Game Boy, Game Gear and the PC.
This video game was based on a Viking Child called Brian who must enter the Halls of Valhalla and do battle against an evil god Loki and his minions.
The game closely resembled Sega's Wonder Boy in Monster Land, as certain elements like collecting hidden gold, upgrading the character's weapons and visiting shops were practically identical, despite the difference in release times.
Programming of the Lead version (Atari ST version) was done by Mark Fisher (a.k.a. Fish, Mr Fish) Original graphics were created by Anthony Rosbottom (a.k.a. Bliz, Blizzard) Music was written by Barry Leitch & Ian Howe
DESC_ZH:
主要标题为《预言 I - 维京少年》，这是一款由 Imagitec Design Limited 为 Amiga、Atari ST、Atari Lynx、Game Boy、Game Gear 和个人电脑开发的游戏。
这款电子游戏的主角是一个名叫布莱恩的维京少年，他必须进入英灵殿，与邪恶之神洛基及其爪牙展开战斗。
尽管发行时间不同，但这款游戏与世嘉的《怪物乐园的神奇小子》极为相似，某些元素，如收集隐藏金币、升级角色武器和光顾商店等，几乎一模一样。
Lead 版本（Atari ST 版本）的编程工作由马克·费舍尔（又名 Fish、Fish 先生）完成。原始图形由安东尼·罗斯博特姆（又名 Bliz、Blizzard）创作。音乐由巴里·利奇和伊恩·豪谱写。

NAME: Vindicators
DESC: Use your tank to destroy other tanks, turrets, and saucers while collecting fuel, stars, and bonuses along the way. Exit the level by finding the key that unlocks the doors. Use collected stars to customize your tank with speed, power, shields, smart shots, and bombs.
DESC_ZH: 驾驶你的坦克摧毁其他坦克、炮塔和飞碟，同时沿途收集燃料、星星和奖励。找到解锁门的钥匙即可通关。使用收集到的星星为你的坦克定制速度、火力、护盾、智能射击和炸弹等属性。

NAME: Warbirds
DESC:
A combat flight action/simulation with colorful graphics and pretty straight-forward gameplay.
Step inside the cockpit of a World War I plane, when there were no sophisticated weaponry, and try to gun down the enemy. Simple as that.
The graphics were faux-3D, as the planes were 2D sprites (natural, considering the release date), but the sky seemed very vast and you could fly around freely.
DESC_ZH:
一款战斗飞行动作/模拟游戏，画面色彩丰富，玩法相当直接。
进入一战飞机的驾驶舱，那时还没有精密的武器，试着击落敌人。就这么简单。
画面采用伪3D效果，因为飞机是2D精灵图（考虑到发行时间，这很正常），但天空看起来非常广阔，你可以自由地四处飞行。

NAME: World Class Fussball/Soccer
DESC: World Class Soccer is a soccer video game. Computer Gaming World criticized the game for only displaying about 10% of the field at a time without a radar screen to show the rest, but liked the animation. The magazine concluded that "World Class Soccer should prove an informative and reasonably entertaining way to prepare for the event".
DESC_ZH: 《世界级足球》是一款足球视频游戏。《电脑游戏世界》批评该游戏一次只能显示约10%的球场画面，且没有雷达屏幕来显示其余部分，但对其动画效果表示赞赏。该杂志总结道：“《世界级足球》应该能成为一种有参考价值且相当有趣的赛前准备方式。”

NAME: Xenophobe
DESC:
Xenos.  The very name strikes fear into every colonist's heart.  A distress call is received from space stations orbiting your homeworld, then silence.  A single ship escapes, piloted by a battered man who tells the tale of pods that hatch into acid-spitting Xenos.
A small band of engineers has been dispatched to combat the Xeno threat before it takes over all the space stations and, eventually, your homeworld.  Assemble your band of engineers and fight the Xenos on each station, striving to either clear it or abandon it.  You start out with a standard issue laser, but can pick up additiona weapons as you find them, including Phasers, Lightning Rifles, Poofer guns, and bombs.
Xenophobe was originally an arcade coin-op by Bally/Midway, released in 1987.  Gameplay premise and setting is heavily inspired/influenced by the movie Aliens.
DESC_ZH:
异形。这个名字让每个殖民者都胆战心惊。你母星轨道上的空间站传来了求救信号，随后便没了声响。一艘飞船成功逃脱，驾驶它的是一名遍体鳞伤的男子，他讲述了那些能孵化出会吐酸液异形的卵荚的故事。
一小队工程师被派去对抗异形威胁，以免它们占领所有空间站，最终危及你的母星。召集你的工程师小队，在每个空间站上与异形战斗，努力清理空间站或选择放弃。你一开始只有一把标准配备的激光枪，但在探索过程中可以找到其他武器，包括相位枪、闪电步枪、喷火器和炸弹。
《异形恐惧症》最初是巴利/米德韦公司于1987年推出的街机投币式游戏。游戏的玩法设定和背景深受电影《异形2》的启发和影响。

NAME: Xybots
DESC:
Xybots is either an unusually simple computer game or an unusually complex coin-op shoot 'em up, depending on your point of view. With either one or two players, you must move through a series of Gauntlet-style underground mazes, killing the bad guys and collecting health and other bonuses from flying saucers (underground? SLIGHT logic gap there, methinks).It's designed to be played co-operatively, although bullets from one player can harm the other.
The Xybots are out to stop you, of course, and many have advanced attack patterns as well as bullets to fire at you. Being able to view round corners is useful, allowing you to plan a strategy - often it's good to send one player forward and let the other play the waiting game, as in Gauntlet.
DESC_ZH:
从不同的角度看，《赛博机器人》既可以是一款异常简单的电脑游戏，也可以是一款异常复杂的街机射击游戏。游戏支持单人或双人模式，玩家必须穿越一系列类似《魔域幽灵》风格的地下迷宫，消灭坏人，并从飞碟（地下有飞碟？我觉得这里有点逻辑漏洞）上收集生命值和其他奖励。
这款游戏设计为合作模式，不过一名玩家射出的子弹可能会伤害到另一名玩家。
当然，赛博机器人会阻止你前进，许多机器人不仅会向你发射子弹，还有复杂的攻击模式。能够看到拐角处的情况很有用，这样你就可以制定策略——就像在《魔域幽灵》中一样，通常让一名玩家向前推进，另一名玩家伺机而动是个不错的选择。

NAME: Zaku
DESC:
Zaku is a futuristic science fiction-themed scrolling shoot 'em up game reminiscent of Air Zonk, where players take control of the titular character through sixteen stages across five worlds, each with a boss that must be fought to retrieve the "Rarity 9" programming tool from Captain Bran. 
 
Developed over a six-year period using an official Lynx development kit, Zaku was first showcased to the public as a playable demo on October 27, 2007 at the Retro-Gaming Connexion convention in Congis-sur-Thérouanne, France.  The finished game was published on 24 October 2009 by Super Fighter Team.  The title was the first new release for the Atari Lynx whose game cartridge has an authentic "curved lip" plastic shell, reminiscent of officially licensed Lynx titles.  It shipped with a packaging mimicking those of licensed Lynx releases.  A second print run was launched on May 2012, while a third print run occurred in August 2016.
DESC_ZH:
《扎古》是一款以未来科幻为主题的卷轴射击游戏，让人联想到《太空炸弹》。在游戏中，玩家操控主角穿越五个世界的十六个关卡，每个世界都有一个首领，玩家必须击败首领，从布兰船长手中夺回“9号珍品”编程工具。

《扎古》使用官方的林克斯开发套件历时六年开发而成。2007年10月27日，它作为可玩演示首次在法国泰鲁阿讷河畔孔日举行的复古游戏大会上向公众展示。成品游戏于2009年10月24日由超级战士团队发行。该游戏是雅达利林克斯主机的首款新发行游戏，其游戏卡带采用了逼真的“弯唇”塑料外壳，让人想起官方授权的林克斯游戏。它的包装模仿了授权林克斯游戏的包装。第二次印刷于2012年5月进行，第三次印刷于2016年8月进行。

NAME: Zarlor Mercenary
DESC: WANTED: Hot gun for hire. Travel to several exotic and dangerous places. Discover several exotic and dangerous aliens and kill them. Kill lots. For cash. Buy more weapons and kill again. Bring up to 3 friends along and kill even more.
DESC_ZH: 急聘：热武器雇佣兵。前往多个充满异域风情且危险的地方。发现各种奇异而危险的外星人并将其消灭。大量杀敌，获取现金。购买更多武器，再次投入战斗。最多可邀请 3 位好友一同参战，杀得更多。
